head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EPSTEIN, CELIA S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EPSTEIN, CELIA S.

block.p: EPSTEIN-Celia S. Devoted wife of the late Max. Beloved mother of Dr. Lynne and Rabbi Zachary Heller. Adoring ''Bubby'' to Rabbi Joshua Zvi and Wendy Heller and to Miriam Eve and Jonathan Stern. Services will be held at Temple Emanu-El, 735 Kennedy Blvd., Bayonne, NJ, on Monday, August 28, at 9:45 AM. Interment will follow at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, NY. For shiva information call ''Wien & Wien,'' 1-800322-0533.
